reference.shortdesc: The bookevent element contains detailed information about a custom book event, such as the type of event, which book revision was part of the event, who was responsible for the event, and when the event occurred.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This element is appropriate for specialization if the existing reviewed, edited, or approved event type elements do not meet your needs.
section.draft-comment: Wouldn't you actually be specializing the <bookeventtype> element?

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookevent element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.
